tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE policy_data (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_name VARCHAR(255),
  implementation_date DATE,
  before_data FLOAT,
  after_data FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE policy_impact (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  impact_metric VARCHAR(255),
  impact_value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policy_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_comparison (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_id INT,
  comparison_metric VARCHAR(255),
  before_value FLOAT,
  after_value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policy_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_comparison (
    comparison_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    before_policy_effectiveness VARCHAR(100),
    after_policy_effectiveness VARCHAR(100),
    comparison_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policies_before(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_changes (
	policy_change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	policy_id INT,
	change_date DATE,
	change_description TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_data_before (
	policy_data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	policy_id INT,
	data_description TEXT,
	data_value FLOAT,
	data_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_data_after (
	policy_data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	policy_id INT,
	data_description TEXT,
	data_value FLOAT,
	data_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_comparison_result (
	comparison_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	policy_id INT,
	comparison_date DATE,
	comparison_result TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policies(policy_id)
);
